      • getIndex

        public java.util.ArrayList<EBIndex> getIndex(EBIndex index)
        Description copied from interface: EBPartitionedHashIndex
        Find the indexes that match the required index. If more than a single index is found, all of them will be returned
        Specified by:
        getIndex in interface EBPartitionedHashIndex
        Parameters:
        index - Index to retrieve
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of matching indexes
